Docs.summary: StorageAccount.

Docs.param: The the Bicep identifier name of the StorageAccount resource. This can be used to refer to the resource in expressions, but is not the Azure name of the resource. This value can contain letters, numbers, and underscores.

The the Bicep identifier name of the StorageAccount resource. This can be used to refer to the resource in expressions, but is not the Azure name of the resource. This value can contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
Docs.summary: Creates a new StorageAccount.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AccessTier As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountAccessTier)

Docs.summary: Required for storage accounts where kind = BlobStorage. The access tier is used for billing. The 'Premium' access tier is the default value for premium block blobs storage account type and it cannot be changed for the premium block blobs storage account type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AllowBlobPublicAccess As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.AllowBlobPublicAccess : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Allow or disallow public access to all blobs or containers in the storage account. The default interpretation is true for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AllowCrossTenantReplication As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.AllowCrossTenantReplication : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Allow or disallow cross AAD tenant object replication. The default interpretation is true for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AllowedCopyScope As BicepValue(Of AllowedCopyScope)

Docs.summary: Restrict copy to and from Storage Accounts within an AAD tenant or with Private Links to the same VNet.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AllowSharedKeyAccess As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.AllowSharedKeyAccess : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the storage account permits requests to be authorized with the account access key via Shared Key. If false, then all requests, including shared access signatures, must be authorized with Azure Active Directory (Azure AD). The default value is null, which is equivalent to true.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AzureFilesIdentityBasedAuthentication As BicepValue(Of FilesIdentityBasedAuthentication)

Docs.summary: Provides the identity based authentication settings for Azure Files.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlobRestoreStatus As BlobRestoreStatus
Public ReadOnly Property BlobRestoreStatus As BicepValue(Of BlobRestoreStatus)

Docs.summary: Blob restore status.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CreatedOn As BicepValue(Of DateTimeOffset)

Docs.summary: Gets the creation date and time of the storage account in UTC.

Docs.summary: Creates a role assignment for a principal that grants access to this StorageAccount.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CustomDomain As BicepValue(Of StorageCustomDomain)

Docs.summary: User domain assigned to the storage account. Name is the CNAME source. Only one custom domain is supported per storage account at this time. To clear the existing custom domain, use an empty string for the custom domain name property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DefineProvisionableProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Define all the provisionable properties of StorageAccount.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property DnsEndpointType As BicepValue(Of StorageDnsEndpointType)

Docs.summary: Allows you to specify the type of endpoint. Set this to AzureDNSZone to create a large number of accounts in a single subscription, which creates accounts in an Azure DNS Zone and the endpoint URL will have an alphanumeric DNS Zone identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property EnableHttpsTrafficOnly As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.EnableHttpsTrafficOnly : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Allows https traffic only to storage service if sets to true. The default value is true since API version 2019-04-01.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Encryption As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountEncryption)

Docs.summary: Encryption settings to be used for server-side encryption for the storage account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ExtendedLocation As BicepValue(Of ExtendedAzureLocation)

Docs.summary: Optional. Set the extended location of the resource. If not set, the storage account will be created in Azure main region. Otherwise it will be created in the specified extended location.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Id As BicepValue(Of ResourceIdentifier)

Docs.summary: Gets the Id.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Identity As BicepValue(Of ManagedServiceIdentity)

Docs.summary: The identity of the resource.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ImmutableStorageWithVersioning As BicepValue(Of ImmutableStorageAccount)

Docs.summary: The property is immutable and can only be set to true at the account creation time. When set to true, it enables object level immutability for all the new containers in the account by default.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsDefaultToOAuthAuthentication As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.IsDefaultToOAuthAuthentication : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: A boolean flag which indicates whether the default authentication is OAuth or not. The default interpretation is false for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFailoverInProgress As BicepValue(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: If the failover is in progress, the value will be true, otherwise, it will be null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsHnsEnabled As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.IsHnsEnabled : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Account HierarchicalNamespace enabled if sets to true.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsLocalUserEnabled As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.IsLocalUserEnabled : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Enables local users feature, if set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsNfsV3Enabled As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.IsNfsV3Enabled : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: NFS 3.0 protocol support enabled if set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsSftpEnabled As BicepValue(Of Boolean)
member this.IsSftpEnabled : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Enables Secure File Transfer Protocol, if set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyCreationTime As StorageAccountKeyCreationTime
Public ReadOnly Property KeyCreationTime As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountKeyCreationTime)

Docs.summary: Storage account keys creation time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property KeyExpirationPeriodInDays As BicepValue(Of Integer)
member this.KeyExpirationPeriodInDays : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<int> with get, set

Docs.summary: The key expiration period in days.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Kind As BicepValue(Of StorageKind)

Docs.summary: Required. Indicates the type of storage account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property LargeFileSharesState As BicepValue(Of LargeFileSharesState)

Docs.summary: Allow large file shares if sets to Enabled. It cannot be disabled once it is enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastGeoFailoverOn As BicepValue(Of DateTimeOffset)

Docs.summary: Gets the timestamp of the most recent instance of a failover to the secondary location. Only the most recent timestamp is retained. This element is not returned if there has never been a failover instance. Only available if the accountType is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Location As BicepValue(Of AzureLocation)

Docs.summary: Required. Gets or sets the location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The geo region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical geo region is specified on update, the request will succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MinimumTlsVersion As BicepValue(Of StorageMinimumTlsVersion)

Docs.summary: Set the minimum TLS version to be permitted on requests to storage. The default interpretation is TLS 1.0 for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Name As BicepValue(Of String)
member this.Name : Azure.Provisioning.BicepValue<string> with get, set

Docs.summary: The name of the storage account within the specified resource group. Storage account names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use numbers and lower-case letters only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property NetworkRuleSet As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountNetworkRuleSet)

Docs.summary: Network rule set.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PrimaryEndpoints As StorageAccountEndpoints
Public ReadOnly Property PrimaryEndpoints As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountEndpoints)

Docs.summary: Gets the URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue, or table object. Note that Standard_ZRS and Premium_LRS accounts only return the blob endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PrimaryLocation As BicepValue(Of AzureLocation)

Docs.summary: Gets the location of the primary data center for the storage account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PrivateEndpointConnections As BicepList(Of StoragePrivateEndpointConnectionData)

Docs.summary: List of private endpoint connection associated with the specified storage account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProvisioningState As BicepValue(Of StorageProvisioningState)

Docs.summary: Gets the status of the storage account at the time the operation was called.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PublicNetworkAccess As BicepValue(Of StoragePublicNetworkAccess)

Docs.summary: Allow or disallow public network access to Storage Account. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property RoutingPreference As BicepValue(Of StorageRoutingPreference)

Docs.summary: Maintains information about the network routing choice opted by the user for data transfer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property SasPolicy As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountSasPolicy)

Docs.summary: SasPolicy assigned to the storage account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecondaryEndpoints As StorageAccountEndpoints
Public ReadOnly Property SecondaryEndpoints As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountEndpoints)

Docs.summary: Gets the URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue, or table object from the secondary location of the storage account. Only available if the SKU name is Standard_RAGRS.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecondaryLocation As BicepValue(Of AzureLocation)

Docs.summary: Gets the location of the geo-replicated secondary for the storage account. Only available if the accountType is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.Sku : Azure.Provisioning.Storage.StorageSku with get, set
Public Property Sku As BicepValue(Of StorageSku)

Docs.summary: Required. Gets or sets the SKU name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StatusOfPrimary As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountStatus)

Docs.summary: Gets the status indicating whether the primary location of the storage account is available or unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StatusOfSecondary As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountStatus)

Docs.summary: Gets the status indicating whether the secondary location of the storage account is available or unavailable. Only available if the SKU name is Standard_GRS or Standard_RAGRS.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StorageAccountSkuConversionStatus As StorageAccountSkuConversionStatus
Public ReadOnly Property StorageAccountSkuConversionStatus As BicepValue(Of StorageAccountSkuConversionStatus)

Docs.summary: This property is readOnly and is set by server during asynchronous storage account sku conversion operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SystemData As SystemData
Public ReadOnly Property SystemData As BicepValue(Of SystemData)

Docs.summary: Gets the SystemData.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Tags As BicepDictionary(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used for viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource. Each tag must have a key with a length no greater than 128 characters and a value with a length no greater than 256 characters.
